titleStmt.title: To the Most Reverend Fathers in God, William Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, Primate of all England and Metropolitan, and John Lord Archbishop of York, Primate of England and Metropolitan
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: In this ed. p. 14 begins: such ways ...
"Given at our court at Whitehall, the fifth day of March 1685. In the second year of our reign."--p. 14.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
